nodes.text: A planet was the site of a battle between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.
The planet had mountains as well as dry, barren, open lands.

In 22 BBY, Grand Master Yoda led a force of clone troopers into battle against the Separatist Droid Army from astride his kybuck. Shaak Ti was also present, along with another Jedi and several others.
